section.title: Overview
section.para: UAC (User Agent Client) module provides some basic UAC functionalities like FROM header manipulation (anonymization) or client authentication.

section.title: Dependencies
section.para:
The following modules must be loaded before this module:
TM - Transaction Module.

section.title: Installation And Running
section.para: The UAC module requires additional functionality in TM module for implementing full FROM restoring. If you use from_restore_mode 1 or 2, you will need to apply the patch replace_from.patch located in the "doc" directory of UAC module.
